**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 126 2.0 **Usage** affixed to armor or a weapon --- The golden religious symbol on the top of this spherical incense holder shifts its form to match the faith of its bearer. You gain no benefit from a judgment thurible if you don’t worship a deity. The spell DC of any spell cast by activating this item is 27.
  • **Armor** After you cast a spell by activating the thurible, the thurible casts 3rd-rank [_protection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1641) on you, with a duration of 1 round.
  • **Weapon** After you cast a spell by activating the thurible, the weapon gains a rune that lasts until the end of your next turn. It gains the [_holy_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2842) rune if your deity allows holy sanctification or the [_unholy_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2851) rune if your deity allows unholy sanctification. If your deity allows both, you can choose which rune the weapon gains. If your deity allows neither, your weapon doesn’t gain a rune.
**Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You cast [_divine lance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=84). Judgement Thurible **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 126 2.0 **Price** 975 gp --- **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You cast [_divine wrath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=86). Judgement Thurible (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 126 2.0 **Price** 14,000 gp --- The additional damage from the rune granted by the thurible is 2d6, and the spell DC is 35. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You cast 6th-rank _divine wrath_. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You cast [_divine decree_](/Spells.aspx?ID=82). Judgement Thurible (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 126 2.0 **Price** 65,000 gp --- The additional damage from the rune granted by the thurible is 2d6, and the spell DC is 43. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You cast 7th-rank _divine decree_. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You cast [_summon deific herald_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1007).
